Package com.ltsllc.miranda.logcache

Class LoggingMap

java.lang.Object
com.ltsllc.miranda.logcache.LoggingMap
public class LoggingMap extends Object
A map that logs all its items to a file

    • setFile

      public void setFile(com.ltsllc.commons.io.ImprovedFile file)

    • add

      public void add(UUID message, UUID owner) throws IOException
      Add a message/owner relationship to the object This method will add the relationship to the logfile then add it to the in memory map.
      Parameters:
      message - The UUID for the message.
      owner - The UUID for the owner.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is a problem writing the relationship to the logfile.

    • get

      public UUID get(UUID message)
      Get the owner of a message
      Parameters:
      message - The UUID for the message for which the caller wants to know the owner UUID.
      Returns:
      The owner UUID for the message or null if we do not know.

    • compact

      public void compact(Validator validator) throws IOException
      Go through the logfile and copy only those messageIDs that are valid
      Parameters:
      validator - How the method determines if a UUID is valid.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • remove

      public void remove(UUID uuid)
      Remove an association from memory

    • shouldRecover

      public boolean shouldRecover()
      Does the object think we should recover? The method returns true if the logfile exists
      Returns:
      true if the object thinks we should recover false otherwise

    • recover

      public void recover() throws IOException
      Recover from a crash This method reads the logfile into memory. Note that this method assumes that there is a logfile to recover from. A recover should immediately be followed by a compaction but this is not a requirement.
      Throws:
      IOException
